vsParam: Nelke, um... the transfer thing, I am sorry.

Don't say that, there's nothing you can do about it.
After all, I have no idea when I can go back to my world.

But I have gotten the permit to be an external student...
I am satisfied to take the classes, thank you so much.

The alchemy class today is so amazing,
The knowledge taught are all new to me——
Really? I am happy to hear your high evaluation. But, you are really daring to whisper before the class ends.

B, Bergamot Sensei!
We talked to Nelke...

Uh, forget it. Let's call it a day. Don't forget to review.
And today's assignment is to collect materials.
And the materials you need to collect are——

Collecting materials... Um, hmm, Bergamot Sensei!
Can I participate in this assignment too?

Er... You are an "external student", and this is the first
time for you to take my lesson. I am glad to see your
passion, but wouldn't it be too difficult for you?

No problem! The guys have showed me the periphery,
I am familiar with this place already...

I studied alchemy in my world. I am confident that
I can handle something like collecting materials.

I see... In this case, you are in. But, bear in mind that
I won't be soft-hearted when I mark your work.

Great, Nelke! You can compete with [px],
and see whom could collect better materials!

That's right! Ho ho, please be merciful,
[px]!

Bergamot Sensei, I am here to submit my assignment!
Please examine it!

Puff, puff...
Sensei! We are also here to submit our assignments!!

Nelke, [px], and you guys,
calm down first.

I didn't expect any student to submit assignment
with a smiling face...
I got excited to engage in a competition...
I am 3 times more confident than usual!

This is good. But I want you to keep this enthusiasm
no matter it's a competition or not, what do you say?

Ho... Looks like you are stimulated by the competitor.
But I hope that you don't lose your original purpose
because of the competition.
Alright, let the results speak. Show me.
Let's start from [px]... Er, you passed.

Keep your state and collect more,
always remember to sharpen your eyes.

Next, Nelke... Uh, it's good.
You passed too.

You work is on a par with [px]'s. I didn't expect you
to separate the materials so accurately.
Does your world also have these materials?

No. I didn't see these materials in my world, but there
are materials with similar characteristics for me to use
as references.

Really... It now seems that you weren't bluffing
when you said you studied alchemy.

Thanks! Even if I couldn't use alchemy myself, I can still
make contributions with my knowledge in alchemy...

I firmly believe that, the alchemical knowledge I learnt
before and will learn in the future will not be useless!

I see... Looks like you are clear about the significance of
knowledge. I hope that you can maintain this attitude.

Bergamot Sensei!
Yes, I'll work harder and make more achievements!

Phew... [px].
Looks like you have a strong competitor in collecting.
I hope you can work harder too as an alchemy student.

Great~! Not only is Nelke smart, she's also hardworking!
[px], you can't lose out to her!
